```{r}

       aes(x = lifeExp, 
           fill = continent)) +
  geom_histogram() + 
  labs(title = "Distribution of Life Expectancy",
       x = "Life Expectancy") + 
  theme_minimal() +
  scale_fill_viridis_d() 

```

```{r}

ggplot(gapminder,
       aes(x = gdpPercap,
           y = lifeExp,
           color = continent)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() +
  labs(title = "Life Expectancy by GDP",
       x = "GDP Per Capita",
       y = "Life Expectancy",
       caption = "Gapminder Data") +
  scale_color_viridis_d() +
  theme_minimal()

```
